attributes.action: Reinstate immediately, Bovingdon and Radlett Fire Stations to fully operational status as they were before closure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Herts CC decision to close the two retained fire stations was taken less than four months after the Buncefield explosion. The crews from these two stations spent many hours tackling the depot fire. They were rewarded with redundancy! 
Our communities do not believe the closure of the Stations was a safe, reasonable and fair decision. We believe it was just cost cutting at the expense of our safety.
Our communities are still fighting to reinstate these Fire Stations, please help us and sign this petition.

government_responses.details:
